name: Valéry Farcy
body:
![picture alt](https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/417572167010623488/DGIpQgTQ_bigger.png) “I wonder if I've been changed in the night? Let me think: was I the same when I got up this morning? I almost think I can remember feeling a little different. But if I'm not the same, the next question is 'Who in the world am I?' Ah, that's the great puzzle!” ― Lewis Carroll, Alice in Wonderland I tweet about #education2.0 #startups #innovation #bizdev #observervation #frenchtech and #IoT as [@VF4rcy](https://twitter.com/VF4rcy) more frequently than I write here.
Follow @VF4rcy
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
